differences.actualValue: <speak>I think you're calling because the Uber Plus card was declined, is that correct?</speak>

text: <speak>I think you're calling because the Uber Plus card was declined, is that correct?</speak>

agentUtterance.text: <speak>I think you're calling because the Uber Plus card was declined, is that correct?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I'm sorry that the Plus Card was declined. There are a few reasons why this may have happened. The card may be declined, if you are at the wrong merchant. Or, if the order total is higher than the amount pre-approved by the customer, the Plus Card will be declined. Please do not tip on the order. If the customer approves a substitute item, the item must be of equal, or lesser value to the original item. Even if your card is declined, you can choose to use your own card or cash instead. For more information on how this works, say, reimbursement info.<break time="750ms"/> </speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

text: <speak>I'm sorry that the Plus Card was declined. There are a few reasons why this may have happened. The card may be declined, if you are at the wrong merchant. Or, if the order total is higher than the amount pre-approved by the customer, the Plus Card will be declined. Please do not tip on the order. If the customer approves a substitute item, the item must be of equal, or lesser value to the original item. Even if your card is declined, you can choose to use your own card or cash instead. For more information on how this works, say, reimbursement info.<break time="750ms"/> </speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

agentUtterance.text:
<speak>I'm sorry that the Plus Card was declined. There are a few reasons why this may have happened. The card may be declined, if you are at the wrong merchant. Or, if the order total is higher than the amount pre-approved by the customer, the Plus Card will be declined. Please do not tip on the order. If the customer approves a substitute item, the item must be of equal, or lesser value to the original item. Even if your card is declined, you can choose to use your own card or cash instead. For more information on how this works, say, reimbursement info.<break time="750ms"/> </speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>To be reimbursed for your payment, first change the payment method from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. Then, after you've paid, upload a photo of the itemized receipt in the app. Please do not add any tip to the total amount. The photo of your receipt will be automatically processed to make sure it's clearly legible without blurriness, or glare. and as soon as the photo is approved, you can complete the delivery as normal. Your reimbursement will be reflected, on your Uber Balance in the app within 24 to 48 hours. and you will receive this reimbursement, as part of your next weekly payout.<break time="750ms"/></speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

text: <speak>To be reimbursed for your payment, first change the payment method from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. Then, after you've paid, upload a photo of the itemized receipt in the app. Please do not add any tip to the total amount. The photo of your receipt will be automatically processed to make sure it's clearly legible without blurriness, or glare. and as soon as the photo is approved, you can complete the delivery as normal. Your reimbursement will be reflected, on your Uber Balance in the app within 24 to 48 hours. and you will receive this reimbursement, as part of your next weekly payout.<break time="750ms"/></speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

agentUtterance.text:
<speak>To be reimbursed for your payment, first change the payment method from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. Then, after you've paid, upload a photo of the itemized receipt in the app. Please do not add any tip to the total amount. The photo of your receipt will be automatically processed to make sure it's clearly legible without blurriness, or glare. and as soon as the photo is approved, you can complete the delivery as normal. Your reimbursement will be reflected, on your Uber Balance in the app within 24 to 48 hours. and you will receive this reimbursement, as part of your next weekly payout.<break time="750ms"/></speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>
